Products.name: Hamburger
Products.information: Hamburger (also burger for short) is a sandwich consisting of one or more cooked patties of ground meat.

Products.name: Pizza
Products.information: Pizza is a savory dish of Italian origin consisting of a usually round, flattened base of leavened wheat-based dough topped.

Products.name: Hot Dog
Products.information: Hot Dog is a food consisting of a grilled or steamed sausage served in the slit of a partially sliced bun.

Products.name: French Fries
Products.information: French fries, or simply fries, chips, finger chips, are batonnet or allumette-cut deep-fried potatoes.

Products.name: Rice Bowl
Products.information: Rice bowl is a Japanese cuisine that serves rice in a bowl along with side dishes that are placed on it.

Products.name: Lemonade
Products.information: Lemonade is a sweetened lemon-flavored beverage. There are varieties of lemonade found throughout the world.

Products.name: Juice Bottle
Products.information: Juice is a drink made from the extraction or pressing of the natural liquid contained in fruit and vegetables.

Products.name: Bread
Products.information: Bread is a staple food prepared from a dough of flour and water, usually by baking. Throughout recorded history.

Products.name: Cake
Products.information: Cake is a form of sweet food made from flour, sugar, and other ingredients, that is usually baked.

Products.name: Ice Cream
Products.information: Ice cream is a sweetened frozen food typically eaten as a snack or dessert.
